attributes.action: Withdraw the United Kingdom from the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We recognize that the British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC) may or may not be contractually obliged to participate in the Eurovision Song Contest in the year 2008.
However, we believe that the BBC should withdraw from the said contest for the year 2008.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
